trans-unit.target: TEXT_CTSMYCRESISTANCELEVELUP_00681_RESISTANCEOFFICER_000_001<tab>Welcome, Blade <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>. If you believe your exploits on the battlefield have proven your mettle and are worthy of evaluation, I would hear of them.

TEXT_CTSMYCRESISTANCELEVELUP_00681_RESISTANCEOFFICER_000_002<tab>That is, of course, assuming you have exploits to report. If you are even half the soldier they say you are, I look forward to your return, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>.
TEXT_CTSMYCRESISTANCELEVELUP_00681_RESISTANCEOFFICER_000_010<tab>Ah, Blade <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>. What news from the front lines?
TEXT_CTSMYCRESISTANCELEVELUP_00681_Q1_000_001<tab>What will you do?
TEXT_CTSMYCRESISTANCELEVELUP_00681_A1_000_001<tab>Offer proof of your mettle.
TEXT_CTSMYCRESISTANCELEVELUP_00681_A1_000_002<tab>Ask about Resistance ranks.
TEXT_CTSMYCRESISTANCELEVELUP_00681_A1_000_003<tab>Nothing.

TEXT_CTSMYCRESISTANCELEVELUP_00681_RESISTANCEOFFICER_000_020<tab>Thank you for your report, Blade <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>, but it was wholly unnecessary. I daresay there is not a soldier in all the Resistance unaware of your courageous deeds.
TEXT_CTSMYCRESISTANCELEVELUP_00681_RESISTANCEOFFICER_000_030<tab>I see... Not the most compelling of reports, but certainly deserving of recognition.
TEXT_CTSMYCRESISTANCELEVELUP_00681_SYSTEM_000_031<tab>You must raise your mettle by <var 22 E802 ((,)) /var> for promotion to the next Resistance rank.
TEXT_CTSMYCRESISTANCELEVELUP_00681_RESISTANCEOFFICER_000_040<tab>Were there not other soldiers to account for it, I would believe your report a work of fiction.

TEXT_CTSMYCRESISTANCELEVELUP_00681_RESISTANCEOFFICER_000_050<tab>The troops will no doubt be inspired when they hear of your accomplishments. I look forward to hearing more of your continued success in the field.
TEXT_CTSMYCRESISTANCELEVELUP_00681_SYSTEM_000_051<tab>A new Resistance quest is now available.
TEXT_CTSMYCRESISTANCELEVELUP_00681_SYSTEM_000_052<tab>A new Resistance quest is now available in Zadnor.

TEXT_CTSMYCRESISTANCELEVELUP_00681_RESISTANCEOFFICER_000_060<tab>Ah, before you go. I am pleased to report our quartermaster has seen fit to expand your lost finds holster. I trust you will put our additional stock of resources to good use.

TEXT_CTSMYCRESISTANCELEVELUP_00681_RESISTANCEOFFICER_000_065<tab>I should also mention that research on the forgotten fragments is proceeding apace, and our appraisers are confident they can identify a greater variety of fragments. I pray they will be of use to you in battle.

TEXT_CTSMYCRESISTANCELEVELUP_00681_RESISTANCEOFFICER_000_070<tab>From what our scouts have told me, the fighting grows fiercer, more desperate with each passing day. I have no doubt you have dealt with such overwhelming odds before, but I would remind you to stay vigilant. There is no telling what they have planned.
TEXT_CTSMYCRESISTANCELEVELUP_00681_SYSTEM_000_071<tab>When fighting at Resistance rank <var 20 E802 /var> or higher, incapacitation will result in a loss of mettle.

TEXT_CTSMYCRESISTANCELEVELUP_00681_SYSTEM_000_072<tab>Furthermore, the use of Return after incapacitation will incur an additional penalty to mettle. The penalty incurred will vary depending on your Resistance rank.

TEXT_CTSMYCRESISTANCELEVELUP_00681_RESISTANCEOFFICER_000_080<tab>If you have nothing else to report, I will not keep you. I pray you stay safe out there, Blade <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>.

TEXT_CTSMYCRESISTANCELEVELUP_00681_RESISTANCEOFFICER_000_090<tab>If you have nothing else to report, I will not keep you. Unless, of course, there is more to tell of your endeavors on the front lines?
TEXT_CTSMYCRESISTANCELEVELUP_00681_Q2_000_001<tab>Do you have more to report?
TEXT_CTSMYCRESISTANCELEVELUP_00681_RESISTANCEOFFICER_000_100<tab>Hah, I suspected as much. Well, let's have it then.
TEXT_CTSMYCRESISTANCELEVELUP_00681_RESISTANCEOFFICER_000_105<tab>Understood. I look forward to your next report, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>.
TEXT_CTSMYCRESISTANCELEVELUP_00681_RESISTANCEOFFICER_000_110<tab>By the gods. I would think such feats impossible were they boasted by any other.
TEXT_CTSMYCRESISTANCELEVELUP_00681_RESISTANCEOFFICER_000_111<tab>On behalf of the Resistance, I extend to you my humblest thanks. With you at our side, hope for a free Bozja shall never be lost.
